issue.title: mangafire.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mangafire.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmangafire.to%2F) ### Comment > This is an issue I have been having a while, when I first found the MangaFire site it worked completely fine, no issues whatsoever. But after going from one place to another in my country, it just came up with the Safari cant establish a secure connection error. Sure, I found a solution to the problem by using a VPN to help me access it, but however there is the strangest part, whenever I use the VPN for long-period of time, it causes some after-effect that causes the site itself to be accessible, despite it not accessible, for short-period of time (note, the VPN after-effect lasted for like 5 days). issue.title: nytimes.com subscription banner
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.54.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.nytimes.com/2023/11/30/health/ptsd-memories-brain-trauma.html

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

Liste AR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I keep encountering a bottom subscription banner on _New York Times_ articles. This banner says: "Enjoy unlimited access to all of The Times". 

I've used the following custom filters to get rid of them, but the webmaster keeps adding new filters, perhaps to evade detection:
```
www.nytimes.com##.css-1hyduui.shown.SUBCON__BAU_ALL_ACCESS_ACQUISITION_234
www.nytimes.com##.css-1hyduui.expanded.SUBCON__BAU_ALL_ACCESS_ACQUISITION_234
www.nytimes.com##.css-1yq8ac.expanded.CONV_DOCK_DESIGN_TEST_2311
www.nytimes.com##.css-1yq8ac.shown.CONV_DOCK_DESIGN_TEST_2311
www.nytimes.com##.css-1jc9y02.shown.CONV_DOCK_DESIGN_TEST_2311
```


<summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![Screenshot 2023-12-01 at 00-14-30 Older and Wiser Peter Gabriel Is Still Looking Ahead(1)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/52135169/a4d519ba-e7d2-43b5-b482-3009e3624944)



### Privacy
